description:
This course will highlight the basics of achieving health. You will learn how to recognize the signs of certain deficiencies and illnesses, how to test for them, and how to treat them. You will also learn about how our food supply has decreased in quality over the last several decade. This course will outline the most important issues that affect mostly everyone. We are all individuals and there is no "one" way to live.

This course will be set up in several small lectures so it will be easy to complete in a short amount of time. Your health is important so it is necessary to learn all of these tips and tricks to get back on the right track to healing your illness or just to maintain your current health.
title: Holistic Health Basics
